## Solubility Data

Here, I load the solubility data and select the predictors (`Molecular.Weight`, `Number.of.Rotatable.Bonds`, `Polar.Surface.Area`), select the label (`solubility.above.or.below.median`), and change the label into a factor:
``` {r message = FALSE, include = FALSE}
binarySolubility <- read_csv("data/delaney-binary.csv")
train <- binarySolubility %>%
  select(Molecular.Weight, 
         Number.of.Rotatable.Bonds, 
         Polar.Surface.Area,
         solubility.above.or.below.median) %>%
  mutate_at(.vars = "solubility.above.or.below.median", .funs = factor)
```

The first 5 rows are:

``` {r echo = FALSE}
head(train)
```

The [`skimr`](https://www.rdocumentation.org/packages/skimr/versions/2.1.1) summary of the data is:

``` {r echo = FALSE}
skim(train)
```
